entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:29 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Temperature: -37.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -41.5°C
Wind: WSW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 60 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023
